categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Jrul was a Jedi Master who lived sometime before the Clone Wars. The Master was attributed with formulating the famous Question of Master Jrul. Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi remembered Jrul's Question when he encountered the Separatist General Grievous on the bridge of the General's flagship,the Invisible Hand, in 19 BBY.

Jrul and the Question were briefly mentioned in the 2005 novel Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith written by Matthew Stover. The Jedi Master later received an entry in The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia, released on December 9, 2008.
